paragraphs.paragraph:
nobody wants to have his or her personal information sold or misused.
 
 
we look at statistics from customer's visits  which tell us  among other things  how many visitors we have and which items are of interest to them.
we use this information to make improvements to our site  and hopefully your experience with us.
however  we do not use this information in any way that personally identifies you.
 
 
we do not give  exchange  trade  or sell your information to anyone  period.
